*R/bindings.R*

## bind_election_results_data

## Description
 Bind Election results data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_election_results_data( 
  ., 
  current_election_data = NULL, 
  current_election_region = NULL, 
  current_election_results = NULL, 
  historical_election_data = NULL, 
  historical_election_region = NULL, 
  historical_election_results = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| current_election_data | A data frame of current election results |
| current_election_region | Current election region (e.g. Congressional district or country). |
| current_election_results | Current Election results. User can include multiple parties by including multiple columns. |
| historical_election_data | A data frame of current election results |
| historical_election_region | Historical election region (e.g. Congressional district or country). |
| historical_election_results | Historical election results. User can include multiple parties by including multiple columns. |
